snippet: Russians dismayed by Vladimir V. Putin’s plans to keep a grip on power are declaring their nonallegiance to a nation where, they say, corruption cuts off options for change.
lead_paragraph: Russians dismayed by Vladimir V. Putin’s plans to keep a grip on power are declaring their nonallegiance to a nation where, they say, corruption cuts off options for change.

headline.main: Putin’s Eye for Power Leads Some in Russia to Ponder Life Abroad
headline.print_headline: Putin’s Eye for Power Leads Some in Russia To Ponder Life Abroad
headline.seo: Putin’s Eye for Power Leads Some in Russia to Ponder Life Abroad
